_aChangeLog.text: Added Sniper room on both sides
Optimized visportals for faster framerate and less unnecessary draw
Replaced fenced ledge with solid stone and connected on both ends
Added High altitude tunnels to reach to either side
Added ladder around bomb zone into tunnels
Optimized the map for visibility and better frame-rate on multiplayer
Created bot navigation file (included in zip)

_sText:
Inspired by map the $2000$ by Calou
I built this map from scratch with some additions
- The terrain size is same, more or less
- Optimized for visibility and multiplayer frame-rate
- 16 + 16 Spawn points
- Handmade NAV file for bot navigation

- Made in this year, hence name 2017
- All the textures are default so you dont need to download any extra resources
- Map fit for deathmatch and gungames
- You are welcomed to use this in your servers.

features:
------------------------
Bomb Zone
Buy Zone (if you want to play it as normal)

Please do suggest and vote if you see this map enjoyable
